Name: Police Chase
About the game: Police Chase In this 3D Fun Filled action packed survival game, you're playing as someone who just robbed a bank in broad daylight making their quick and speedy escape, but somethings gone horribly wrong! The cops have found about the robbery, and are hot on your trail! Try and survive and evade the coppers for as long as possible and give those cops a run for their money! In this Police Chase, you need to try and evade the cops for as long as possible as your score counter creeps upwards with every passing second! Collect the Money on the ground to raise the score, and collect repair kits to fix the car before it inevitably breaks down and explodes. See how long you can survive! Gameplay: - 3D Endless Top Down Police Chase Survival. - Score based system. - Collect Money and repair kits to survive as long as possible with the highest score possible. - Fast paced difficulty incline. Features: - Fully Customizable Cars with different pros and cons. - High score system so you can compete against your best. - Achievements to enhance your gaming experience. Join the police chase today!
